Soaring Strike.name: Soaring Strike
Soaring Strike.flavor: You leap into the air, weaving through your enemies. Then, like a diving hawk, you strike, startling an unwary foe.
Soaring Strike.effect: You fly up to your speed and make the following attack once at any point during the movement. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Soaring Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier or Charisma modifier damage.

Soaring Fellowship.name: Soaring Fellowship
Soaring Fellowship.flavor: You deliver a masterful attack, and the magic filling you from the effort takes you and your friends aloft.
Soaring Fellowship.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier or Charisma modifier damage.
Soaring Fellowship.effect: You and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a fly speed of 6 until the end of your next turn. When the speed ends, the affected characters descend to the ground, taking no falling damage.
Soaring Fellowship.sustainMinor: The fly speed persists until the end of your next turn.

Flight Burst.name: Flight Burst
Flight Burst.flavor: With a gleeful heart, you take to the air.
Flight Burst.effect: You fly up to your speed.
Flight Burst.special: You can use this power only once per round.
